mods.name: World Debaychery
mods.description:
List of all changes so far:
-Towel in sex scenes with Sakura - removed.
-Kurotsuchi's clothes have been removed in the kiss scene.
-The towel on Temari by the lake has been removed.
-Slightly fixed Karin in the scene at the sources.
-In all scenes, Mei is nude.
-Changed Mei costume.
-Changed the face of Samui.
-Changed all scenes with Tsunade, hospital, restaurant, dream, everywhere she is naked.
-Changed all scenes with Karin, everywhere she is naked, and also removed the moment where she is in the bushes.
-Changed scenes with Sakura in the hospital, massage and self-satisfaction of Sakura, everywhere naked.
-Changed the scene with the secretary, when she climbs on the shelf she is naked.
-Changed the Halloween scene with Shizune, she is now without underwear.
-Changed scenes with Mikasa, in the futanari version, the sex organ was completely removed.
-Added 5 costumes.
